title: Dendrogram Mixing Measures
text: goal dendroMix summarize select mixture models via dendrograms constructed overfitted latent mixing measures. methods bridge hierarchical clustering mixture modeling, providing consistent selection mixture components interpretable hierarchical structure discovery. Includes functions simulation, visualization, applications single-cell RNA-seq analysis.

title: Dendrogram Mixing Measures
